name: Sol Summoner
description:
From the Creators of Sol Summoner, follow the greatest cultist on the sacrifice spree of a lifetime.

HOW TO PLAY

Left Mouse Button: Select

WASD keys: Move

Space Bar: Swing Scythe

Escape: Takes you to the exit menu during gameplay (hit twice to leave without pushing a button)

NOTES

Game does not work in fullscreen mode as of now

Mellow Minds is:

Octopus: Programming, SFX, Sun Summoner, Ball Exploded, Nada Cefalowpod

Fish125: Lead Artist, Squirrel Artist, Semi-Surgeon

Ape Jones: Character Artist, Drew the Character Once and Never Again, Basically a God

The Red Weirdo: Bear Artist, Nothing Doer, Surgeon, Freeloader

Mighty Oreo: Urine Enthusiast

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/8ka2sZXPTR
